author: Yoree Koh
title: Watch Out, Live Video Is the New Data Hog
text:
Vantreese Collins-Hodges recently began using Periscope to broadcast herself live from her smartphone, thinking the new app would be a good way to share tips with clients of her resum√©-writing business.
But after spending an hour on the app for three straight days during her commute to work, she found she was quickly blowing through much of her... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
